markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 3" pfs="Standard">[Secret Page](/Spells.aspx?ID=270)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 367 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**
[Irez](/Deities.aspx?ID=121), [Lissala](/Deities.aspx?ID=156), [The Enlightened Scholar's Path](/Deities.aspx?ID=251), [Thoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=61)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>

<row>1 minute ([material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284))</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 page up to 3 square feet in size
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** unlimited
</row>

</column>

---

You change the target's text to different text entirely. If the text is a spellbook or a scroll, you can change it to show a spell you know of _secret page_'s level or lower. The replacement spell cannot be cast or used to prepare a spell. You can also transform the text into some other text you have written or have access to. You can specify a password that allows a creature touching the page to change the text back and forth. You must choose the replacement text and the password, if any, when you Cast the Spell.
name: Secret Page

<traits>

</traits>

<additional-info>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Deities**

<row gap="medium">
 

**Duration** unlimited
</row>
</additional-info>

---

<summary>
Alter the appearance of a page.
</summary>
summary: Alter the appearance of a page.

target: 1 page up to 3 square feet in size

text: Secret Page Source Core Rulebook pg. 367 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Deities Irez, Lissala, The Enlightened Scholar's Path, Thoth Cast 1 minute (material, somatic, verbal) Range touch Target 1 page up to 3 square feet in size Duration unlimited --- You change the target's text to different text entirely. If the text is a spellbook or a scroll, you can change it to show a spell you know of secret page 's level or lower. The replacement spell cannot be cast or used to prepare a spell. You can also transform the text into some other text you have written or have access to. You can specify a password that allows a creature touching the page to change the text back and forth. You must choose the replacement text and the password, if any, when you Cast the Spell.
